full_summary:
### Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender

##### Solicitation Number: W8482-241503/A

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for a tender to supply various spares for Victoria-Class ships. The solicitation number for this tender is W8482-241503/A.

**Summary of Requirements**

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of the following items:

* Processed and synthetic rubber
* Nails
* Anchors
* Miscellaneous fasteners
* Bushings
* Sprockets
* Gaskets
* Electrical controls and accessories
* Valves

The delivery location for the spares will be at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Tender Details**

* Tender closing date: July 6, 2023 at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Expected contract start date: September 6, 2023
* Expected contract end date: March 27, 2024

**Bid Evaluation Criteria**

The bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Submission Requirements**

* Bidders must submit a completed tender package, which includes a proposal and supporting documentation.
* The submission must be made in either English or French.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

* Tiehan Zhang, Contracting Officer
* Email: [Tiehan.Zhang@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Tiehan.Zhang@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (000) 000-0000
* Address: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Attachments**

* Annex A: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5591/w8482-241503--annex-a_0_0.xlsx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5591/w8482-241503--annex-a_0_0.xlsx)
* RFP: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5591/w8482-241503-a---rfp_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5591/w8482-241503-a---rfp_1.pdf)
